name: Spinning My Tails
description:
A shoot em up game inspired by Spinning My Tails! -  You as Sonic and Tails, takes on hoards of various Badniks, try to survive as long as you can :]

This is one of my games that is supported by all kinds of devices, including PC and mobile devices!

Controls

  • Arrow keys to move or Drag with finger 
  • Space bar to shoot or Single Tap with finger

Easy controls eh!? 

Share your score in the comments below :} 

And also, if you liked this game and want like this, please share it and comment your reviews and suggestions below :]

Made with Godot Game Engine, 
This game is FOSS, all the source code at - https://github.com/SahilGupta1331

All Game Assets

  • Most assets ripped from Spinning My Tails video
  • Game Background - Deviantart.com
  • Tornado Sprite - Pinterest.com
  • Sound Effects - Sounds Resources
  • Other Sprites - Spriters Resources
